name: Acceptance Criteria - Ensure that all employees and subcontractors are:
– Using the correct and complete set of drawings.
– All drawings are the latest revision
Record of conformity - This ITP signed

Acceptance Criteria - A dilapidation report is to be completed and submitted prior to works on site. Dilapidation report to include photos and recordings of the condition of the site compounds areas prior to start.
Record of conformity - Aconex & This ITP signed
Acceptance Criteria - Hardstand area has current BYD plans, service scanned, and existing services has been proved. Services have been identified and protected prior to demolition.
Record of conformity - This ITP signed
Acceptance Criteria - All necessary control measures are being implemented, which include PSP, ECP, TMP, SWMS and WP
Reference Documents - PSP, EMP, TMP, SWMS, WP
Record of conformity - This ITP signed
Acceptance Criteria - Ensure PFAS testing has been completed. The results of the testing will be used to determine the appropriate disposal or re-use of the demolished materials.
Record of conformity - This ITP signed and test report

Acceptance Criteria - Prior to works, check that excavation permit has been obtained from APAM prior to any ground penetrating works. Internal Fulton Hogan permit has been issued for excavation works and plant operators have a Go-Card.
Reference Documents - APAM Excavation permit, FH Permit, Go-Cards
Acceptance Criteria - Ensure testing is carried out to obtain a Hardstand design that meets the requirements and suitable for use.
Reference Documents - APAM Excavation permit, FH Permit, Go-Cards, FH spec
Acceptance Criteria - Work area has been cleaned and surveyed (marked on site). Limits of hardstands are clearly marked.
Reference Documents - Site Markups, Survey layouts
Record of conformity - This ITP signed
Acceptance Criteria - Ensure topsoil stripped as per hardstand temp design and subgrade compacted to meet design requirements from Geotechnical Engineer.
Record of conformity - This ITP signed
Acceptance Criteria - Contaminated or PFAS materials are to be taken to Gate 11 to be stockpiled into their dedicated category and contaminant.
Record of conformity - This ITP signed and Negri Permit
Acceptance Criteria - Make sure hardstand is built according to the geotechnical temp design, no soft spots existing after proof rolling.
Record of conformity - This ITP signed
Responsibility - Project/Site Engineer, Foreman, Geotechnical Engineer
Acceptance Criteria - Construct culvert crossing/driveway access where required as per the temporary design.
Record of conformity - This ITP signed
Acceptance Criteria - Fencing installation is done as per the temp design or Australian standards AS4687
Record of conformity - This ITP signed
Acceptance Criteria - Sheds are level and as per the site management plan.
Record of conformity - This ITP signed
Acceptance Criteria - Hayshed has been constructed as per the verified temporary design provided by OPT
Record of conformity - This ITP signed
3.3 - Connecting electrical and plumbing services and appliances
Acceptance Criteria - All appliances and connections are functional and tested and tagged
Record of conformity - This ITP signed

On behalf of Fulton Hogan it is hereby certified that the Works represented by the items of work listed have been tested in accordance with the Project Quality Plan and conform in all respects with the requirements of the Contract.
